data.trans: Thuộc về ai đó/cái gì đó
data.trans_hint: Khu vực này thuộc Tây Ban Nha.
data.content_game_1: This area belongs to Spain.
data.answer_en_hint: This area belongs to Spain.

data.trans_hint: Lần đầu tiên khi tôi xây dựng doanh nghiệp cho mình, tôi đã gặp may. Tôi đã gặp những người đồng sáng lập tuyệt vời, những người có cùng tầm nhìn với tôi.
data.en_hint: When I first built my business, I had a stroke of luck. I met amazing co-founders who had that same visions as I did.
data.content_game_1: When I first built my business, I had a stroke of luck. I met amazing co-founders who had that same visions as I did.
data.answer_en_hint: When I first built my business, I had a stroke of luck. I met amazing co-founders who had that same visions as I did.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đã rất lo sợ rằng cuốn sách mới của cô ấy sẽ không được chú ý đến nhiều, nhưng nó lại được bán hết trong nháy mắt.
data.en_hint: We were worried that her new book might not get a lot of attention, but it was sold out at a stroke.
data.content_game_1: We were worried that her new book might not get a lot of attention, but it was sold out at a stroke.
data.answer_en_hint: We were worried that her new book might not get a lot of attention, but it was sold out at a stroke.

data.trans_hint: Lần đầu tiên khi bạn bắt đầu khởi nghiệp, sẽ thực tế hơn khi nghĩ cách hòa vốn hơn là cách tạo ra lợi nhuận.
data.en_hint: When you first start a business, it is more practical to think about how to break even rather than how to make profits.
data.content_game_1: When you first start a business, it is more practical to think about how to break even rather than how to make profits.
data.answer_en_hint: When you first start a business, it is more practical to think about how to break even rather than how to make profits.

data.trans_hint: Bố tôi phải mất cả cuộc đời để phát triển doanh nghiệp này, vì vậy tôi sẽ không để điều gì phá hỏng nó.
data.en_hint: It takes my dad his whole life to build up this business, so I will let nothing ruin it.
data.content_game_1: It takes my dad his whole life to build up this business, so I will let nothing ruin it.
data.answer_en_hint: It takes my dad his whole life to build up this business, so I will let nothing ruin it.

data.trans: Bỏ vào cái gì đó (chi phí)
data.trans_hint: Rất nhiều tiền đã được bỏ vào cái công ty này; chúng ta không thể bỏ cuộc bây giờ được.
data.en_hint: A lot of money has gone into this business; we can't just give up now.
data.content_game_1: A lot of money has gone into this business; we can't just give up now.
data.answer_en_hint: A lot of money has gone into this business; we can't just give up now.

data.trans_hint: Sau khi tốt nghiệp, tôi muốn bắt đầu sự nghiệp ở mảng du lịch giống như cha tôi đã làm.
data.en_hint: After graduating, I would like to go into tourism just like my father did.
data.content_game_1: After graduating, I would like to go into tourism just like my father did.
data.answer_en_hint: After graduating, I would like to go into tourism just like my father did.

data.trans_hint: Ngân hàng này sẽ không bao giờ đi sâu vào lý do tại sao họ từ chối hồ sơ vay vốn của bạn đâu.
data.en_hint: The bank will never go into the reason why they reject your loan application.
data.content_game_1: The bank will never go into the reason why they reject your loan application.
data.answer_en_hint: The bank will never go into the reason why they reject your loan application.

data.trans: (Có một) Hiệu ứng dây chuyền (lên cái gì)
data.trans_hint: Việc Tom nghỉ việc để lại hiệu ứng dây chuyền cho công ty. Một số nhân viên khác cũng muốn nghỉ việc.
data.en_hint: That Tom was leaving has a knock-on effect on the company. Some other staff also want to quit their job.
data.content_game_1: That Tom was leaving has a knock-on effect on the company. Some other staff also want to quit their job.
data.answer_en_hint: That Tom was leaving has a knock-on effect on the company. Some other staff also want to quit their job.

data.trans_hint: Khá là bấp bênh trong vài năm đầu, nhưng sau đó chúng tôi đã dựng lên được doanh nghiệp này.
data.en_hint: It was touch and go for the first several years, but then we managed to build up the business.
data.content_game_1: It was touch and go for the first several years, but then we managed to build up the business.
data.answer_en_hint: It was touch and go for the first several years, but then we managed to build up the business.

data.trans: Thành công (khi làm việc gì khó)
data.trans_hint: Mặc dù bắt đầu từ con số 0, anh ấy cực kỳ quyết tâm để thành công trong công việc kinh doanh này.
data.en_hint: Despite starting from zero, he is very determined to make a go of this business.
data.content_game_1: Despite starting from zero, he is very determined to make a go of this business.
data.answer_en_hint: Despite starting from zero, he is very determined to make a go of this business.

data.trans: Truyền lại cái gì tới ai
data.trans_hint: Bố mẹ chúng tôi làm việc vất vả để họ có thể truyền lại tài sản kế thừa cho chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: Our parents work hard so that they can pass their legacy on to us.
data.content_game_1: Our parents work hard so that they can pass their legacy on to us.
data.answer_en_hint: Our parents work hard so that they can pass their legacy on to us.
